com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.pattern
Interface IUnitValidator

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdditiveUnitValidator, ConfigurationUnitValidator, UnitValidator
public interface IUnitValidator

Implemented by unit-level deployment validators.

See Also:
UnitDomainValidator

getUnitType

EClass getUnitType()
Returns the type of unit that this validator can chek.

Returns:
the EMF class of the unit type (a subtype of Unit).

getUnitValidatorId

java.lang.String getUnitValidatorId()
Returns an id for the UnitValidator

Returns:
a string which is the ID for the UnitValidator.

validate

void validate(Unit unit,
              IDeployValidationContext context,
              IDeployReporter reporter)
Validates the deployment unit, and its contained objects.

The unit validator is responsible for validating the unit and its contained objects including:

  • Unit.getCapabilities()
  • Unit.getRequirements()
    • Requirement.getExpressions()
    • Requirement.getLink()
  • Unit.getUnitLinks()
  • Unit.getArtifacts()

Implementations are responsible for restricting validation based on the Unit.getInitInstallState() and Unit.getPublishIntent(). For InstallState.INSTALLED and PublishIntent.DO_NOT_PUBLISH units only limited validation of outgoing hosting and logical should be performed.

Parameters:
unit - the unit to be validated.
context - the topology-level validation context (used or indexing).
reporter - used to report errors.
